title: Crystal Palace vs Manchester City - Premier League 2019/20: Live score and updates
text:
Crystal Palace host Manchester City at Selhurst Park in this evening's Premier League clash.

Pep Guardiola's side will be looking to bounce back from their defeat to Wolves with a win against Palace as they look to avoid Liverpool gaining any more lead in the title race.

The Eagles are winless in their last four EPL home matches against Man City as they look to register a win against defending Premier League champions.

Sportsmail's Matt Porter will provide live Premier League coverage of Crystal Palace vs Manchester City including score, lineups and build-up.
description: Pep Guardiola's side will be looking to bounce back from their defeat to Wolves with a win against Crysta Palace as they look to avoid Liverpool gaining any more lead in the title race. Follow LIVE HERE.
